Sentencas: The thermal and chemical expansivity of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-delta (x = 0.4) was measured using in situ powder neutron and synchrotron X-ray diffraction at temperatures between 932 K and 1170 K and oxygen partial pressures, P-O2, between 10(-19) bar and 0.1 bar, giving a wide range of oxygen non-stoichiometry from (5 = 0.05 to 0.22.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: Changes in (5 were measured independently using gas analysis.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: This P-O2 and temperature range covers the material's use as a chemical looping oxygen carrier, a sensor material and in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: Thermal and chemical expansivities were found to be dependent on the oxygen non-stoichiometry, delta.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: For delta < 0.2 and T = 932-1050 K, the linear thermal expansivity was 5.72(4) x 10(-5)
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: angstrom/K and the linear chemical expansivity was 0.144(9)
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: A per unit change in delta.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: For delta > 0.2 and T = 973-1173 K, the linear thermal expansivity increases to 6.18(8) x 10(-5) angstrom/K.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ

Sentencas: For > 0.2, the linear chemical expansivity varies with both delta and temperature.
Titulo: Revisiting the thermal and chemical expansion and stability of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δ
